'''''Scaling the Scorching Sacred Mountain (I)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (I)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must unlock all '''46''' [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the following areas: [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]], [[Tequemecan Valley]], [[Coatepec Mountain]], and [[Toyac Springs]].

Some Teleport Waypoints can only be accessed upon progressing certain World Quests and exploration, including the following:
* {{Quest|Shadows of the Mountains}}
* {{Quest|Tale of Dreams Plucked From Fire}}
* {{Quest|Between Pledge and Forgettance}}
* {{Quest|Ripe For Trouble}}
* [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Trail of Subjugated Saurians]]''
